scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n server,client "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.dev:oracle: concurrently -k -n server,client "npm run dev:server:oracle" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.dev:no-seed: concurrently -k -n server,client "npm run dev:server:sqlite:no-seed" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.dev:server:sqlite: set DB_PROVIDER=Sqlite&& if exist "C:\Program Files\dotnet\dotnet.exe" ("C:\Program Files\dotnet\dotnet.exe" run --project server/YMS.Server.csproj --urls http://localhost:5000) else (dotnet run --project server/YMS.Server.csproj --urls http://localhost:5000)
scripts.dev:server:sqlite:no-seed: set DB_PROVIDER=Sqlite&& set DISABLE_SEED=true&& if exist "C:\Program Files\dotnet\dotnet.exe" ("C:\Program Files\dotnet\dotnet.exe" run --project server/YMS.Server.csproj --urls http://localhost:5000) else (dotnet run --project server/YMS.Server.csproj --urls http://localhost:5000)
scripts.dev:server:oracle: set DB_PROVIDER=Oracle&& if exist "C:\Program Files\dotnet\dotnet.exe" ("C:\Program Files\dotnet\dotnet.exe" run --project server/YMS.Server.csproj --urls http://localhost:5000) else (dotnet run --project server/YMS.Server.csproj --urls http://localhost:5000)
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.build:server: if exist "C:\Program Files\dotnet\dotnet.exe" ("C:\Program Files\dotnet\dotnet.exe" build server/YMS.Server.csproj) else (dotnet build server/YMS.Server.csproj)
